title: BuzzFeed
summary: BuzzFeed, Inc. is an American Internet media, news and entertainment company with a focus on digital media. Based in New York City,[3] BuzzFeed was founded in 2006 by Jonah Peretti and John S. Johnson III to focus on tracking viral content. Kenneth Lerer, co-founder and chairman of The Huffington Post, started as a co-founder and investor in BuzzFeed and is now the executive chairman.
